Name: "hyi1101"
Review Title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
 Cracking/Chipping after less than 6 months of use
Review Content:
This worked great for a while. We just bring it from the kitchen to the home office and back to be washed. Along the way this one started cracking/chipping already. I pinged Stanley about a warranty claim and their unfortunate response is below. I've had swag mugs from company events that chip/peel like this after a few months but was expecting more from Stanley. My Yeti is still holding together great after a couple of years. I'll stick to Yeti going forward as apparently this damage is considered normal.

"Thank you for your inquiry, based on the information you've provided this would not be covered under Stanley's warranty.

Our warranty covers any defect in workmanship or materials and to be thermally efficient, provided they are used according to the instructions. This warranty does not cover component parts, cosmetic defects, or malfunction due to wear & tear, alteration or accident.

All our products go through rigorous quality checks including multiple dishwasher cycles and abrasion testing. Chipping, peeling, or fading paint is typically a result of wear and tear or accidental damage would not be covered under our manufacturer's warranty"
Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2024

Name: M
Review Title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
 I absolutely love my Stanley
Review Content:
The Stanley Quencher H2.0 FlowState Tumbler has quickly become my go-to for staying hydrated throughout the day.My drinks stay cold for hourrs, I've even left ice water in it overnight, and there were still ice cubes the next morning! It also does an excellent job keeping my coffee hot for several hours, making it perfect for busy mornings.
This tumbler is built to last. The stainless steel construction feels sturdy and durable, yet it‚Äôs surprisingly lightweight. The lid fits securely, and I appreciate the rotating cover that keeps the straw clean when I‚Äôm on the go. The design is sleek and modern, and the range of colors available makes it easy to find one that suits your style.
The wide mouth makes it easy to add ice cubes and also to clean. The FlowState straw is a nice touch‚Äîit has a comfortable size for sipping, and I love that it‚Äôs reusable. The tumbler fits perfectly in my car‚Äôs cup holder, which is a big plus for me since I‚Äôm always on the move.
The Stanley Quencher H2.0 Tumbler is a fantastic investment if you‚Äôre looking for a high-quality, versatile tumbler that performs well for both hot and cold beverages. It's stylish, practical, and worth every penny. Highly recommended!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2024
